title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.27 - Wharf obstructions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.27 - Wharf obstructions

State Regulations

Stevedores, owners of vessels and all persons using Port
facilities shall remove from the docks, wharfs and other surface, all
equipment, appliances, material or objects which is not part of a cargo, and
keep the apron of the dock or other surface free from litter or
debris. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
